content:
I've been working on the training, and Max is slowly getting better at walking by my side. It's still a work in progress, but I'm hopeful that with consistent practice, he'll learn to walk nicely on a leash.

By the way, I recently got him an interactive feeder toy to help slow down his eating. It's been a game-changer! He loves it, and it's really helped to reduce his gobbling.
